20#if HAVE_CONFIG_H
21# include <config.h>
22#endif
23
24/* Specification. */
25#include "xalloc.h"
26
27#include <string.h>
28
29/* Return a newly allocated copy of STRING. */
30
31char *
32xstrdup (const char *string)
33{
34 return strcpy (xmalloc (strlen (string) + 1), string);
35}
36
